summary: Way of Learning - Educational platform with 4 user roles (Teacher, Student, Parent, Admin), featuring messaging, attendance tracking, assignments, quizzes, learning materials, discussion forums, and calendar scheduling. Built with Motoko backend and React/TypeScript frontend with Internet Identity authentication.
architectural_notes: Motoko backend with React/TypeScript frontend using Tailwind CSS
Internet Identity for authentication supporting passkeys, Google, Apple, Microsoft login
Role-based access control for 4 user types: Teacher, Student, Parent, Admin
React Router for dashboard navigation and feature module routing
imageRequirements:
